title: Manikyam & Vaiduryam Nakshi Haaram - Emerald and Polki Diamond Necklace
materials: South Sea Pearls. Exhibits fine Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
features: Intricate Nakshi work on gold settings. Graduated emeralds and polki diamonds set in a closed setting, maximizing brilliance. The pendant features a central polki diamond surrounded by emeralds and dangling South Sea pearls, creating a graceful movement. Antique finish enhances the vintage appeal.
colors: Dominant gold with vibrant green emeralds and sparkling white polki diamonds. The pearls add a soft
occasions: and festive occasions. Also suitable for making a statement at formal events and upscale gatherings.
description: A timeless piece showcasing exquisite craftsmanship and traditional South Indian design. The combination of emeralds, polki diamonds, and pearls symbolizes prosperity, purity, and grace. Durable and heirloom-worthy, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi craftsmanship guarantees a piece of unparalleled quality and beauty.
